channel.title: My Pocket Coach
channel.managingEditor: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.copyright: © Image Excellence Group - all rights reserved
channel.description:
My Pocket Coach is an online coaching platform to develop the personal impact power and all aspects of personal mastery, team effectiveness and organizational performance. We empower our clients to communicate with impact, manage impressions, influence, lead, and direct with distinction. These critical abilities produce powerful brand ambassadors who captivate the imagination and turn strategy into reality.

My pocket coach offers coaching tips and guidance that is scientifically-based, holistic and integrated, mobilising field experts to provide sustainable outcomes. Our team of multi-disciplinary specialists apply a unique methodology combining digital guidance, assessments, and online coaching to empower individuals.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Coaching Advice, Tips and Crisis Management
channel.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios

item.title: Assertive Communication | Hayley Kirby (IE Group | Assertiveness and Life Coach)
item.itunes:title: Assertive Communication | Hayley Kirby (IE Group | Assertiveness and Life Coach)
item.itunes:subtitle: How to be treated with respect
item.description:
In this episode Hayley Kirby(Assertiveness and Life Coach) talks to host Gail Cameron (Managing Director of Image Excellence Group and Founder of the new and exciting online platform for coaching; My Pocket Coach) about the importance of assertive communication in both personal and professional contexts. We explore the origin and nature of assertive communication and how assertiveness can enhance relationships with others.


Music Used : Big Achievement | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


My Pocket Coach App http://mypocketcoachapp.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Taking Your Leadership to the Next Level | Linda Aiyer (IE Group | Personal and Business Coach)
item.itunes:title: Taking Your Leadership to the Next Level | Linda Aiyer (IE Group | Personal and Business Coach)
item.itunes:subtitle: Understanding what type of leader are you
item.description:
In this episode, Gail Cameron (CEO and Founder of the Image Excellence Group), speaks to Linda Aiyer, about the hot topic of Leadership Coaching. We begin by exploring what is leadership coaching and how we distinguish this from other forms of coaching. Central to this episode is a discussion on the changing landscape of work, and what is required of our leaders presently and going forward, to meet the demands of a VUCA (Volatile, Uncertain, Complex, and Ambiguous) world. In fact, when you add Disruption and Diversity to the mix, leaders are faced with an environment that is unrecognisable. Given this context, leadership coaching has become more critical and valued than ever. Gail and Linda explore what a typical leadership coaching journey would look like, and discuss some of the tools that are utilised by coaches in this space. The tools discussed in this episode relate to the Leader Personality, what type of leader are you, and how does this impact the way you lead others. One of the other lenses we consider in customising a development path for each leader, is what stage of maturity they may be functioning at, and how to work with them to get to a level of optimum functioning and maximum impact. If you are a leader, aspiring leader, or a leader without a title, then listen to this episode to gain insights as to how coaching can raise your level of effectiveness and impact.

Music Used : Big Achievement | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


My Pocket Coach App http://mypocketcoachapp.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Change won't kill you! | Amanda de Lange (IE Group | Change Strategist)
item.itunes:title: Change won't kill you! | Amanda de Lange (IE Group | Change Strategist)
item.itunes:subtitle: A five-step approach that will have you soaring through transition
item.description:
Gail Cameron speaks to Amanda de Lange, an MPC Coach and Change Strategist, about processing personal change. Although navigating your way through a major change and period of transition can be daunting and filled with challenges, it doesn't have to overwhelm you. Amanda speaks from experience as someone who embraced a major career change after a successful career as a journalist spanning 30 years. She shares the five-point strategy she has developed in order to produce empowering change and successful transitions.

Music Used : Big Achievement | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


My Pocket Coach App http://mypocketcoachapp.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Emotional Intelligence is more relevant today than ever | Ronelle Huddy (IE Group | Consulting Psychologist)
item.itunes:title: Emotional Intelligence is more relevant today than ever | Ronelle Huddy (IE Group | Consulting Psychologist)
item.itunes:subtitle: Managing your emotions and learning Emotional Intelligence
item.description:
In this episode Gail Cameron Managing Director of The Image Excellence Group talks to Ronelle Huddy an Industrial psychologist who has worked with the group for a number of years as a specialist in the field of Emotional Intelligence. We explore what Emotional Intelligence is and why the skills described by this construct are critical for surviving the pressures and complexities of the modern world. Ronelle also explains how you can understand your own Emotional Intelligence in terms of how you engage with the world around you and develop the skills necessary to thrive.

Music Used : Big Achievement | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


My Pocket Coach App http://mypocketcoachapp.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Enhancing your Personal Impact Power through Voice and Speech | Elri Wium (IE Group | Voice and Speech Specialist)
item.itunes:title: Enhancing your Personal Impact Power through Voice and Speech | Elri Wium (IE Group | Voice and Speech Specialist)
item.itunes:subtitle: It's not about what you say, it's about HOW you say it.
item.description:
In this episode Elri Wium, Executive Coach and Specialist on Nonverbal Communication, Emotion, and the Voice and Speech, speaks to Gail Cameron, the Director of the IE Group, about the important role that the voice and speech plays in the selling of ideas and your personal brand. In this information driven world, we tend to rely so much on our content, facts, material or data, that we tend forget about who we are presenting it to – the human. And that is where the body language, Emotional prosody, tone of voice, and modulation comes into play. This means that your content, facts, material or data might be brilliant, BUT if you cannot convey that information in an interesting way, whether in a boardroom, negotiation, presentation, interview, or even a team or staff meeting, then it will lose its effect completely and your ideas alone won’t get you anywhere. Therefore, in order to enhance your personal and communicative impact power in these high-stakes situations, it is imperative that you grasp the listeners attention and make yourself and the information memorable.


Hillman shows how to develop communication behavior that makes a positive first impression and keeps the attention of the audience. https://books.google.co.za/books?id=ZOckAQAAMAAJ

Dr. Genard's exercises help people from all walks of life deal with issues like establishing rapport, pacing your presentations, and moving listeners. https://books.google.co.za/books?id=VL7koAEACAAJ

Music Used : Big Achievement | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


My Pocket Coach App http://mypocketcoachapp.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Strategic Image Management | Chivonne Jones (IE Group | Image Coach)
item.itunes:title: Strategic Image Management | Chivonne Jones (IE Group | Image Coach)
item.itunes:subtitle: Personal Mastery and Branding
item.description:
Perception is the only Reality others have; and their Perception is their Reality. > Strategic Image Management and Personal Branding. Our image management coaching focuses on Personal Branding and Image Excellence. Personal branding is the inner perspective one needs to know about who you are, Image Excellence is the outward reflection and embodiment thereof. Authenticity is magnetic, if we can make the connection between the highest expression of our Personal Brand and what it would look like in the world, we start to develop a unique value proposition that is underpinned by a high degree of self-awareness and confidence. To guide us on this journey we use a framework that covers important elements outlining how we can enhance our personal impact power including: - The Primacy Effect and its Criteria; - “Enclothed” Cognition Psychology; - Dress code for the work context; - The Science of colour; - Basic Body and Face shape Analysis; and - Accessories, grooming, make up, hairstyle. > What is Strategic Image Management? Strategic Image Management by its very definition suggests that you can and should manage the perceptions that others have of you. Perception is the only reality. Strategic Image Management is a composite issue forming part of a holistic approach towards the way in which you communicate. Everything about you speaks – your body language, appearance and your voice.

Music Used : Big Achievement | https://johnbartmann.com/about/


My Pocket Coach App http://mypocketcoachapp.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
